com.github.hotware.lucene.extension.bean.type

Interface SingularFieldType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSingularType, StockType.BooleanType, StockType.DoubleStringType, StockType.DoubleType, StockType.FloatStringType, StockType.FloatType, StockType.IntegerStringType, StockType.IntegerType, StockType.LongStringType, StockType.LongType, StockType.SerializeType, StockType.StringType

    public interface SingularFieldType
extends Type
    types that store their stuff in a singular field (that can still have multiple values, but most of the time the already supported Set and List are sufficient)
    Author:
    Martin

      • handleDocFieldValue

        void handleDocFieldValue(org.apache.lucene.document.Document document,
                         String fieldName,
                         Object value,
                         org.apache.lucene.document.FieldType fieldType,
                         Class<?> objectFieldType)
        adds a field of this Type to the given Document
        Parameters:
        document - the Document to put the field into
        name - the fields name in the Document
        value - the original value
        fieldType - the frozen FieldType to use
        objectFieldType - the Class of the original value
